reviews.text: Innotel is a very modern hotel. Rooms are small but comfortable. Breakfast was not a highlight but the cleanliness of the rooms was.
reviews.title: One night stand

reviews.text: Innotel is a boutique hotel and the design are very modern. The room is nice except it is too small.the bathroom is good. but They don't serve many kind of breakfast.
reviews.title: Good hotel, great location

reviews.text: I must say the location is very good if you don't bring car, because here is no parking place for cars, but if you go without cars, the location of this hotel is very strategic, there are 2 bus stations near the hotel and there is MRT station across the hotel, Dhoby Ghaut MRT station.
reviews.title: A great little hotel in a convenient part of town
